name: Gotify Server
description: Ensures the Gotify notification server is responding on port 8091.
check_cmd: if curl -fs --max-time 3 http://localhost:8091/health 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'ok'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --filter 'name=gotify' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q gotify; then docker restart gotify || true; else docker start gotify || true; fi; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart gotify || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if curl -fs --max-time 3 http://localhost:8091/health 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'ok'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
